title: I'm laughing.
body:
Two week ban for making a joke about drugs, meanwhile the person who openly advertised a elo boosting website didn't get touched and isn't banned in-game.

Priorities.

replies.body: drugs are expensive. when someone offers you drugs, you take it because droogs are expensive

> [{quoted}](name=Feyris Nyannyan,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MQhOHEP3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-17T23:46:11.557+0000)
>
> drugs are expensive. when someone offers you drugs, you take it because droogs are expensive

don't forget to say please and thankyou.
I'm laughing, scrub inbred pu**ss**y limped  back to the forums to put his fat hairy ass onto the boards d**i**ck

> [{quoted}](name=Justify,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MQhOHEP3,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-18T00:43:52.432+0000)
>
> I'm laughing, scrub inbred pu**ss**y limped  back to the forums to put his fat hairy ass onto the boards d**i**ck

Ayy girl chill out, I'll get to you in a minute.

P.S. My ass is not hairy.
bby i am chiled ouyt wat u telkin abot? o mi brother weint on

How did you get banned from the game for making a joke about drugs, are you sure that was it?

I assumed banning anyone from a service over words that could easily be taken out of context especially
when they are text would be very stupid for any company to try on considering it could come back to them.
